accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Charles Gossett Collation of Sinclair Oil "Bushbeater" Newsletters #6335m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Sinclair Oil (founded in 1916) is a vertically-integrated oil company, involved in all aspects of the oil industry, including oil and gas exploration and motor fuel distribution. The company has executive offices in Salt Lake City, Utah, two refineries in Wyoming, and over 1,500 branded Sinclair stations in 29 states.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Bushbeater issues no.1 (1972:Jan. 4) - no.5 (1972:Jan. 8); no.8 (1972:Jan. 12) - no.12 (1972:Jan. 17); no.15 (1972:Jan. 20) - no.17 (1972:Jan. 22). The Bearded Wonder Speaks, volume 9, book 3 (1972:Jan. 17).
